title: El extra√±o retorno de Diana Salazar
overview: With a plot elaborated over time, this story about the forbidden love of Leonor and Eduardo in the 17th century had a tragic ending as she was sentenced to death for witchcraft. However, the mysterious fate brought them together several centuries later as Diana and Mario. This time, she is a doctor and he is a renowned scientist. Will they succumb to an inexplicable attraction and open their arms to eternal love 400 years later?
